mapper.select: SELECT u.id user_id, u.username, ou.org_id, ou.org_name, ou.org_type, tmp.id role_id, tmp.NAME, tmp.org_ref_id, tmp.from_date, tmp.end_date, tmp.unbound FROM ( SELECT ou.user_id, ou.org_ref_id, orf.* FROM org_user ou JOIN organization_reference orf ON ou.org_ref_id = orf.id WHERE ou.enabled = 'y' ) ou LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.id = ou.user_id RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT ura.user_id, ura.from_date, ura.end_date, ura.unbound, ura.org_ref_id org_ref_id1, ur.* FROM user_role_assignment ura JOIN user_role ur ON ura.role_id = ur.id WHERE ura.enabled = 'y' ) tmp ON ou.org_ref_id = tmp.org_ref_id1 WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.enabled = 'y'
